title: For a couple of weeks, for the rest of our lives?

replies.msg:
Sometimes, when I'm walking with you, people come up and ask me if we're a couple yet. But every time they approach me, I respond with a firm no.

I've thought about whether we're a couple before, and I always think about how long will stay together. For a couple of weeks, for the rest of our lives? I'm never confident enough to say yes, because I'm scared of losing my best friend. I'm scared that there won't be anybody there to hear me cry. I'm scared of losing someone I can talk to.

So if you find the right man, I’ll congratulate you and feel happy for you. And I hope that man is patient enough, kind enough, and understanding enough to realize you for who you are.
